topics.body:
*Apparently, one of the heroes brought a telephone with her, which is awkward when explosions happened everywhere and she still has some bars. Though, I'm just the narrator so that's not really on my resume to talk about. I get paid doing this stuff.*

*The heroes are now having tea, which tastes terrible, before resuming their battle or if they wish, talk about flying rainbows and underwater UFOs. Which again, I'm not to question.*

*Though, I am curious. Tell me, young mortal. Who is this man of which you have went on with social interactions approximately 7 days in reverse?*
